name: confluent-kafka
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 5000 MB Disk
postInstallNotes:
Apache Kafka by Confluent is being installed.

	Documentation: https://www.confluent.io/whitepaper/deploying-confluent-platform-with-mesosphere
	Community Support: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/confluent-platform

	If you installed from the UI, enter `dcos package install confluent-kafka --cli` from the DC/OS CLI to install the Confluent Kafka CLI subcommands.
postUninstallNotes:
Apache Kafka by Confluent is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10, no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions, follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/confluent-kafka/2.0.1-3.3.0e/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
